mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo(todoNum, subject, content, reg_date, userId) VALUES (#{todoNum}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM todo t JOIN member_detail m ON t.userId = m.userId
AND t.userId = #{userId}
SELECT t.todoNum, t.userId, subject, content, TO_CHAR(t.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date FROM todo t JOIN member_detail m ON t.userId = m.userId WHERE todoNum = #{todoNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT todoNum, subject FROM todo t JOIN member_detail m ON t.userId = m.userId
AND (todoNum > #{todoNum} )
ORDER BY todoNum ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT todoNum, subject FROM todo t JOIN member_detail m ON t.userId = m.userId
AND (todoNum < #{todoNum} )
ORDER BY todoNum DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE todo SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE todoNum = #{todoNum}
mapper.select: INSERT INTO todoNum_file ( fileNum, originalFilename, saveFilename, todoNum, fileSize ) VALUES (todo_file_seq.NEXTVAL, #{originalFilename}, #{saveFilename}, #{todoNum}, #{fileSize})
